forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 14 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sky is predominantly sunny, though there is an underlying chill lingering in the air as temperatures hover around the mid-sixties. A brisk westerly wind whistles through the city, occasionally intensifying into the gusts that dance along the waterfront. As the day gently wanes, the sun's warmth will start to retreat, making a cozy layer more desirable, especially for those venturing into the evening. The clouds will gradually weave themselves into the evening sky, blanketing the city beneath a soft, gray hue, yet the forecast keeps the low at a comfortable 57 degrees.

As twilight approaches, one might find the allure of the city's vibe particularly inviting, perfect for a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the distant sounds of laughter and churning waves blend seamlessly with the crisp air. Layering up with a light jacket may be prudent, especially with the wind’s bite. A visit to one of the local cafés might serve as a lovely refuge, offering warmth alongside a soothing cup of coffee or tea, while the atmospheric shift of the evening unfolds. Given these conditions, one may relish the charm of the city by embracing both its tranquility and lively spirit, perhaps even catching a glimpse of the fog beginning to creep in, gently cradling the iconic bridges in its embrace as the night deepens.
